column4: hey guys i have a secondary drive and i was wondering how i can view it.. it's FAT32 format
can someone help me out with my FAT32 drive?
whats up with your FAT32?
i'm trying to view it because i just put some mp3 files onto it
so i sorta wanna copy the files from it but i cant view the drive..
just mount it the view it
first, sudo fdisk -l /dev/hda
yes...
its named /dev/hda3
it says.. wrong fs type..
maybe wrong partition or your partition is damage
but i was just viewing it on windows xp
what partition FAT32 have?
eh? what do u mean
it could be just FAT but im pretty sure its FAT32
can i formate the whole drive from partitions and everything somehow?
don't format or you loose all your data
yes i want to do that
all i have to do is go back into windows and put all the songs back on
is there a way?
you there?
